Package com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.adapters

Class AnnouncementListAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AnnouncementListAdapter.AnnouncementViewHolder>
com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.adapters.AnnouncementListAdapter
public class AnnouncementListAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AnnouncementListAdapter.AnnouncementViewHolder>
A RecyclerView adapter for displaying and managing a list of announcements. Supports actions like editing and deleting announcements for faculty users.
